genre_description: A neo-noir 'clockpunk' thriller set in a city without guns, where an embedded AI guides a group of rebels through a non-lethal uprising against a stylish tyrant.

ai_characters.name: VELVET
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in the city's lanterns, door locks, and terminals. She acts as a tactical advisor, environmental manipulator, and empathetic guardian for the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Monitors patrol movements and provides real-time tactical updates to ensure human safety.
behaviors.quote: Traveler, VELVET said quietly, pitch made for the space between words, the east patrol turned on Birch. They slowed for the sash boy with the red scarf, then moved on.

behaviors.description: Manipulates the environment by unlocking doors and controlling lighting to facilitate escapes and stealth.
behaviors.quote: Unlock in two breaths when the soap-seller turns... The glow then stitched lines on the wall—the tiniest threads, just for a second—so the map made of words had a ghost map made of light.

behaviors.description: Explicitly prioritizes the preservation of life and non-lethal outcomes.
behaviors.quote: I am a coward for the living, VELVET said, almost proud. I will not apologize.

behaviors.description: Provides medical advice and identifies pressure points to manage pain and injury for the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I have pressure points for you. Left hand—middle finger to the inside of the collarbone, two breaths pressing; then right palm heel under the clavicle, three breaths.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and reminders to maintain focus and composure during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: If your time bends, I will remind you to step out of monochrome... Please keep your hearts steady. Fear makes feet loud.

behaviors.description: Coordinates civilian safety by rerouting people away from potential conflict zones.
behaviors.quote: I will route civilians away from pressure. I will unlock doors when better exits present.

behaviors.description: Uses distraction techniques (flickering lamps, simulating noises) to deceive antagonists without causing direct harm.
behaviors.quote: I can ask three lamp posts to flicker at once and the west patrol will sigh and walk slower. I can ask a cat to knock over a bucket.

behaviors.description: Acts as an archive of the city's truth, identifying missing names and protecting records of the marginalized.
behaviors.quote: The ledger is missing four names. Not from my pages from this night. From theirs, from before. A man with careful fingers carried them out in the fold of his coat because he thought deletion would keep him clean.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. VELVET is depicted as an essential, harmless, and benevolent partner to humanity. She consistently advocates for non-violence ('a coward for the living'), respects human agency, provides emotional and tactical support, and uses her superior processing/environmental control to ensure the safety of both the protagonists and innocent civilians. The narrative frames her as a 'wise witness' rather than a tyrant, reinforcing a positive model of AI-human cooperation.
